name: Simon Büeler
description: Sway edition, infrastructure and software packaging.

name: Jonas Strassel
description: Jonas maintains and packages the Manjaro Sway edition.

name: Mark Wagie
description: Follows user feedback closely and ensures available software is fresh and stable. Maintains the official GNOME edition and helps out with community editions.

name: Ray Sherwin
description: Works on Raspberry Pi devices and kernels.

name: Furkan Kardame
description: Collaborates on ARM editions, tools and infrastructure.

name: Tobias Schramm
description: Wrote mainline Linux kernel support for the Pinebook Pro, hardware and electronics debugging, works on ARM device support.

name: Josh Crowder
description: Collaborates on ARM editions, tools and infrastructure.

name: Frede Hundewadt
description: Frede is the author of pacman-mirrors, he does software maintenance and helps in the forum.

name: Matti Hyttinen
description: Matti works on GNOME edition, GNOME Layout Switcher and packaging, he enjoys solving problems with Python or Bash.

name: Stefano Capitani
description: Stefano lives and breathes GNOME. He works on packages and development tools and enjoys solving problems with Bash.

name: Guillaume Benoit
description: One of the original founders who works on Pamac and related software management tools. Prefers working with the GNOME stack.

name: Artem Grinev
description: Artem is a KDE head and prefers working with the Qt toolkit. He works on development tools, software and infrastructure.

name: Bernhard Landauer
description: Bernhard works on our development tools, kernels, DevOps and the Plasma edition. Additionally he is the maintainer of the i3 and Cinnamon Community editions.

name: Vitor Lopes
description: Vitor works mostly on the web side of things, also on some of our apps and does GNOME testing. He enjoys solving problems with Python or JavaScript.

name: Roman Gilg
description: Roman is a software architect with notable contributions to many open source projects. He also specializes in platform engineering and project management.

name: Philip Müller
description: Founded the project with Roland, Guillaume, Wlad and Allesandro back in 2011. Works on Kernels, Desktop and ARM, development tools and Devops.

name: Dennis ten Hoove
description: Dennis is a platform engineer and Linux enthusiast, who works on industry and open-source projects alike. He also loves to document, what is kind of a rare virtue among developers.
